post:
Hello LET! Last month Ho-ost started advertising shared hosting services located in Manchester, UK. Now, for a limited time we'd like to slash the prices down on these services as a launch promotion.

You're also able to get a free domain on our SSD2 package when you pay annually. 

**Here's what we offer with these packages:**
> - Pure SSD Disk Space
- Unlimited Databases
- Unlimited Email Accounts
- Cpanel W/ CloudLinux
- Free Softaculous
- Free Site.Pro Site Builder
- Located In Manchester, UK
- Free AutoSSL
- Free CloudFlare

<pre>

- 100GB Bandwidth 
- 1 Hosted Websites
</pre>
